|4 = Steve, stoned, after tasting Monica's pre-appetizers. }} '''Steve''' is a character on ''Friends'', who first appeared in "[[The One With The Stoned Guy]]" as a restaurant owner that shows up high on cannabis to a gourmet meal [[Monica Geller|Monica]] cooked for him. He is portrayed by [[Jon Lovitz]]. ==Appearances== In "[[The One With The Stoned Guy]]", [[Phoebe Buffay|Phoebe]] introduces [[Monica Geller|Monica]] to Steve, one of her massage clients, because he is a restaurateur looking for a new chef. Monica prepares a gourmet meal for him, but when he shows up, Phoebe reveals that he lit up a joint on the ride over and is now stoned. Steve acts like a fool, attempting to eat taco shells from Monica's cupboard and spilling gummy bears into a bowl and then tells Monica to call 911. Eventually, he tries to eat a kitchen magnet and Monica is forced to take him to the emergency room, where she leaves him. Steve does not appear again until the [[Season 9]] episode "[[The One With The Blind Dates]]", where Phoebe deliberately sets [[Rachel Greene|Rachel]] up on a bad blind date with him in hopes that she will get back together with [[Ross Geller|Ross]]. On the date, Steve reveals that he lost his restaurant to drugs and now sells silk screens t-shirts. He also shares a studio apartment with two other guys and believes himself to be infertile. ==Trivia== *Steve does not reappear for a span of 193 episodes, the longest of any character on ''Friends''. Other characters who go to lower numbers of reappearances are: ** [[Mark Robinson]] - 165 episodes ([[The One With The Tiny T-Shirt]]-[[The One With Princess Consuela]]) ** [[Sandra Greene]] - 144 episodes ([[The One With The Two Parties]]-[[The One With The Baby Shower]]) ** [[Leonard Greene]] - 123 episodes ([[The One With The Race Car Bed]]-[[The One With The Stripper]]) ** [[Doug]] - 109 episodes ([[The One With Chandler's Work Laugh]]-[[The One With Ross' Step Forward]]) ** [[Stu]] - 95 episodes ([[The One With The Girl From Poughkeepsie]]-[[The One With The Stripper]]) ** [[Richard Burke]] - 84 episodes ([[The One Where Monica and Richard Are Friends]]-[[The One With The Proposal, Part 1]]) ** [[Jack Geller]] - 48 episodes ([[The One With The Princess Leia Fantasy]]-[[The One With Ross' Wedding, Part 2]]) ** [[Estelle Leonard]] - 37 episodes ([[The One With The Screamer]]-[[The One With Chandler's Work Laugh]]) ** [[Judy Geller]] - 27 episodes ([[The One With The Princess Leia Fantasy]]-[[The One With The Cuffs]]) ** [[Amy Green]] - 21 episodes ([[The One With Rachel's Other Sister]]-[[The One Where Rachel's Sister Babysits]]) *He is the only character on the show to say the word Dick (although Chandler uses this word to name an eventual baby of [[The Chick and The Duck]]).
